titleStmt.title: The last legacy, or, Affectionate and pious exhortation, and admonitions of the late William Lord Russel, to his vertuous lady, and dear children, summed up by him during his confinement, and left them for their advantage after his death, and for the good of all Christian families
titleStmt.author: Russell, William, Lord, 1639-1683.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
